oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-11-03 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 3, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Rex Allen, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Rex Allen; Chet Atkins; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb and June Carter introduce Rex Allen -- No One Will Ever Know (Rex Allen) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Chet Atkins -- Side By Side (Chet Atkins) -- Voting reminder P.S.A. (Ernest Tubb) -- Treat Her Right (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Jordanaires (Musical group); Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Allen, Rex, 1920-1999
